mapper.sql: E.ID, E.PROJECT_NAME, E.PROCUREMENT_DEP_ID, E.EXTRACTION_TIME, E.EXTRACTION_SITES, E.EXTRACT_THE_WAY, E.CREATED_AT, E.UPDATED_AT, E.PROJECT_CODE, E.PROJECT_ID, E.PACKAGE_ID, E.PACKAGE_NAME, E.PACKAGE_NUMBER, E.STATUS, E.PURCHASE_TYPE, E.TENDER_AT, E.AREA_NAME, E.PROJECT_TYPE, E.CONSTRUCTION_PRO, E.SELL_BEGIN, E.SELL_END, E.SELL_ADDRESS, E.SELL_PROVINCE, E.CONSTRUCTION_ADDR, E.SELL_SITE, E.IS_DELETE, E.CONDITION_ID, E.REMARK, E.CONTACT_PERSON, E.CONTACT_NUM, E.PROJECT_INTO, E.EXTRACT_USER, E.BUILD_COMPANY, E.CONTACT_PHONE
mapper.select: SELECT R.*,A.NAME PROVINCE_NAME,AR.NAME CITY_NAME FROM T_SES_SMS_EXTRACT_RECORD R LEFT JOIN T_SES_BMS_AREA A ON R.SELL_PROVINCE = A.ID LEFT JOIN T_SES_BMS_AREA AR ON R.SELL_ADDRESS = AR.ID WHERE R.ID = #{id}
mapper.update:
UPDATE T_SES_SMS_EXTRACT_RECORD
PROJECT_ID = #{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROCUREMENT_DEP_ID = #{procurementDepId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROJECT_CODE = #{projectCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROJECT_TYPE = #{projectType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROJECT_NAME = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PACKAGE_NAME = #{packageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PACKAGE_NUMBER = #{packageNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PURCHASE_TYPE = #{purchaseType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONSTRUCTION_PRO = #{constructionPro,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONSTRUCTION_ADDR = #{constructionAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SELL_BEGIN = #{sellBegin,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SELL_END = #{sellEnd,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SELL_ADDRESS = #{sellAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SELL_PROVINCE = #{sellProvince,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SELL_SITE = #{sellSite,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACT_PERSON = #{contactPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONDITION_ID = #{conditionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACT_NUM = #{contactNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACT_PHONE = #{contactPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXTRACT_THE_WAY = #{extractTheWay,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
IS_DELETE = #{isDelete,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
EXTRACTION_SITES = #{extractionSites,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXTRACT_USER = #{extractUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUILD_COMPANY = #{buildCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXTRACTION_TIME = #{extractionTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PACKAGE_ID = #{packageId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AREA_NAME = #{areaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TENDER_AT = #{tenderAt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PROJECT_INTO = #{projectInto,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATED_AT = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.insert:

SELL_END,

mapper.select: SELECT R.* FROM T_SES_SMS_EXTRACT_RECORD R WHERE R.ID = #{value}
SELECT R.* FROM T_SES_SMS_EXTRACT_RECORD R WHERE R.IS_DELETE = 0 AND R.EXTRACT_THE_WAY = 0 AND R.STATUS = 2
